BasicInfo.short: Company behind Gyazo, an app for seriously easy sharing of screen caps and GIFs.

Products.name: Gyazo
Products.description: Seriously easy sharing of screen caps and GIFs.

Products.name: PhotoPeach
Products.description: Photopeach is a social slideshow service that allows users to create a custom flash slideshow.

Products.name: Davinci note
Products.description: Their original intention for Davinci note was to cut out everything that got in the way of just creating and sharing ideas.
